name: Too Deep In Love [Demo]
description:
After your father passed away, you and your mother moved back to the old town that you grew up at.  It's far from the city so you also needed to transfer school.

On your first day to a new school, you bumped with a guy  that you never seen before. He turns out to be your classmate. Be his friend  and learn more about him but don't let him get too attached to you tho. 

Some Info:
  1. Mc's gender is female 
  2. Nameable mc
  3. Only one love interest
  4. Different choices to learn more about him
  5. 1/4 Finished

(Art,Script,Gui and all the other stuff is by me/JustDaDeby)

(Music,Audio is a free source that i found from yt . Credit is in 'Readme' inside the game file)

This is my first visual novel so don't expect too much from it, If you finish the demo feel free to comment your opinion or thoughts on this vn. Remember that this game is still a demo, if there's an error or missing picture just tell me in the comment. (English is not my main language) 

This is only a game, nothing more.
